about_the_game:
A bored goddess has sent you to another world to watch you struggle for survival, just to get her rocks off! But you never back down from a challenge, do you?

As a lover of sex toys, you've used elements from this fascinating world to make a one-of-a-kind sex shop. Run your shop with a haughty heiress and a variety of other babes to create a kingdom of carnal desire!

Eleanor Liberty Jekyll

"Do you want me...to do something I shouldn't?"
"Hmph! Wh-whatever, you...you pervert!"
"Hehehe... Well, then. Don't mind if I do!"

Chloe the Shepherdess

"I g-get shy when you keep looking at me like that..."
"Your body gets me so hard, Chloe. You should be more confident in yourself!"
"Um...wh-why does my body feel a wittle funny?"

Sylvia Oakley

"Mmm... Such a yummy finger..."
"Hehehe, somebody's enjoying themself?"
"Yaaa... Cuz you're stirring me up just right..."

Nico

"Pffft. Don't be so full of yourself! You think I feel something?"
"Sh-shut up! You think a goddess like m—*moannn*"
"Ooo... Maybe I'm a dirty little goddess?"

18 sex scenes with a total of 187 visual variations.

content_descriptors.notes:
All character depicted are over the age of 20.
Content Warning! This game contains: bondage, exhibitionism, sexual insult.

name: Isekai Sex Boutique

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: intel i5+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: support DirectX 12.0+
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: intel i5+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: support DirectX 12.0+
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: You mysteriously find yourself in another world and, as a lover of sex toys, you decide to jump on a business opportunity to start a new life. Run a sex shop with a haughty heiress and hot employees from a variety of races, and make this the best sex shop in the (other) world!
supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese*, English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
